page.title: 17Housing Development
page.content: Older{detached houses}flank the main roads of Retford.Large houses (formerly)coaching Inns are used as hotels or pubs e.g White Hart,Vine Inn and Newcastle Arms and are located {where the roads meet}. {Terraced houses}are located near the centre of town,usually adjacent to a bridge e.g Gringley Terrace by Gas House Bridge. The North Rd estate,two new construction developments in Hallcroft,Carrhill estate,Spital Hill flats represent a mixture of {council/private home}ownership.Only Spital Hill is a re-development site,the others are {green field}sites The new housing developments in Hallcroft,on Leverton Rd.,and Welham Rd. are{encroaching into farmland}to the North and North East.
